attributes.action: Save the residents of Rowner from being forced off the property ladder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want Rowner residents to be treated fairly instead of being forced out of their homes and off of the property ladder. This development is not about benefiting the residents of Rowner but making a profit and squeezing in more homes in the already overcrowded town of Gosport who's transport routes are already over stretched. How can we add more people to the A32 when it cannot cope with what it has? This development is ill concieved at best.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
